basics.name: Muhammad Ahmad
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Recent Computer Science graduate with strong foundation in machine learning and software development. Demonstrated experience in building applications using computer vision libraries, data analysis, and creating user-friendly interfaces. Passionate about applying ML technologies to solve practical problems, with particular interest in gesture recognition and sentiment analysis.

projects.name: GestuNova
projects.description: Developed a Linux application for hands-free computer control using gesture recognition
highlights: Built a desktop application that integrates MediaPipe's hand tracking to enable gesture-based computer control
Developed user-friendly GUI allowing users to create and customize gesture-to-command mappings
Implemented system integration layer to execute Linux commands and keyboard shortcuts based on detected gestures
Created robust event handling system to manage real-time gesture detection and command execution

projects.name: Lahore Property Analysis
projects.description: Built comprehensive real estate market analysis tool for rental properties
highlights: Developed data processing system for standardizing property metrics across listings
Created statistical and spatial analysis pipeline using Python, Matplotlib and Seaborn
Implemented geocoding system for location-based market segmentation
Generated detailed visualizations and reports for property valuation patterns

projects.name: UK Crime Data Analysis
projects.description: Created large-scale crime pattern analysis system using Apache Spark
highlights: Processed millions of street-level crime records across multiple UK counties
Implemented SQL-based analysis pipelines for efficient data processing
Developed automated county mapping and jurisdiction standardization
Created visualization system for crime trends and patterns analysis

projects.name: Hotel Review Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Built NLP system for analyzing customer feedback in hospitality industry
highlights: Developed sentiment analysis pipeline using Python and NLTK
Created word cloud visualizations for theme identification
Implemented robust data cleaning for inconsistent review formats
Generated granular ratings for specific service aspects

projects.name: Chess Blunder Detection
projects.description: Developed chess analysis tool using Stockfish engine integration
highlights: Created system for analyzing PGN files and detecting critical position evaluation changes
Implemented recursive algorithm for variation tree analysis
Developed automated analysis file generation for blunders
Built tournament history processing pipeline for pattern identification

education.institution: Punjab University College of Information Technology (PUCIT)
